Title: Relates to enacting the peer-to-peer car sharing act
Summary: Enacts the peer-to-peer car sharing program act, which provides guidelines for establishing peer-to-peer car sharing programs and outlines how they shall be insured, which cars shall be used, how drivers shall work under such programs, and how liability should be determined under such programs in the case of an accident or damaged property.
LawCode: Add Art 35 §§3501 - 3507, Ins L; add Art 12-C §§220 - 220-o, Gen Bus L; add Art 29-D §§1299-J - 1299-N, Tax L; amd §311, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the general business law, the tax law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to enacting the peer-to-peer car sharing program act
